alerts.title: Zero-Day Exploit in Windows Graphic Component
alerts.description: A critical zero-day vulnerability (CVE-2025-12345) is being actively exploited in the Windows graphics subsystem. Microsoft has not yet released a patch.
actions: Do not open unknown image files or attachments.
Limit internet access for critical systems.
Monitor Microsoft's official advisories for updates.

alerts.title: Ransomware Surge Targets Education Sector
alerts.description: Multiple universities have reported ransomware attacks exploiting unpatched VPN appliances.

news.title: Phishing Campaign Targets Banking Apps
news.description: A widespread phishing campaign is targeting users of major banking applications. Be cautious with emails requesting personal information.

news.title: Critical Chrome Update Released
news.description: Google has released an emergency update to patch a security flaw exploited in the wild. Update your browser immediately.
